title: Gifting
body:
Hiya! It's my friend's birthday today and I want to send him a skin but it says "gifting is temporarily unavailable, please try again later" 

Is this going to be available any time soon? thanks!!{{champion:154}}

replies.body: Are you using the updated client?  Gifting is not currently available there, but you should be able to gift through the legacy client.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PdmBw47A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-17T20:29:34.137+0000)
>
> Are you using the updated client?  Gifting is not currently available there, but you should be able to gift through the legacy client.  Hope that helps!

Yea im using the updated one, how do i go back to the legacy client, is there an option somewhere?

Return to the login screen and you'll find a Launch Legacy Client option below the Sign In button.  :D

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PdmBw47A,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-17T21:13:37.287+0000)
>
> Return to the login screen and you'll find a Launch Legacy Client option below the Sign In button.  :D
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

thank you good sir!!!!!!!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
